flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=330>>330
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $330 / 2 = $<<330/2=165>>165
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $165 + $10 = $<<165+10=175>>175 to the shelter.
#### 175

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 330. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
